required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Aavaliação do Tratamento de Telangiectasias Dos Membros Inferiores Com Laser 1064mm

brief_summary.textblock: Is 1064 nm YAG Laser better than sclerotherapy to treat leg veins?

detailed_description.textblock: Comparison between laser and sclerotherapy in the treatment of telangiectasias of legs.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: One leg laser ando the other sclerotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes analysis after treatments of leg telangiectasias´clearance through photography using a scale of improvement.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Analysis of photographic changes previous, and one week after treatment. Patient reanalysis after 1 and 3 months
primary_outcome.description: Patients are asked about the best method to treat leg veins after three treatments of laser and three treatments of sclerotherapy. Evaluation of the photographic improvement of the treated areas on a scale of 0 (no improvement) to 10 (complete cleaning of the vessels).

primary_outcome.measure: Changes analysis after treatments of leg telangiectasias´clearance using a questionnaire to classify the pain
primary_outcome.description: Patients are asked about the best method to treat leg veins after three treatments of laser. All patients were asked to respond to a questionnaire classifying the pain (none, little, very painful or extremely painful).

primary_outcome.measure: Changes analysis after treatments of leg telangiectasias´clearance using a questionnaire to classify the cleaning of vessels
primary_outcome.description: Patients are asked about the best method to treat leg veins after three treatments of laser. All patients were asked to respond to a questionnaire classifying the cleaning of vessels (poor, regular, good or excellent)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes analysis after treatments of leg telangiectasias´clearance using a questionnaire to classify the satisfaction with results
primary_outcome.description: Patients are asked about the best method to treat leg veins after three treatments of laser. All patients were asked to respond to a questionnaire classifying satisfaction with results (nothing, little or much

arm_group.description: to compare laser and sclerotherapy on treating leg veins

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with leg telangiectasias
Exclusion Criteria:
- varicose veins
- DVT
- pregnancy

overall_official.affiliation: Hospital das Clinicas, University of Sao Paulo

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator, Associate Professor, MD, PhD
